content.html:
@nkoenig I see ROS console output as a feature, maybe I am in the minority :) All joking aside, I guess we should:

  1. fix the segfault caused by missing world (whether we need to patch plugin or patch gazebo), and/or
  2. consider starting gazebo with an empty world when the user specified world is not found. This seems to be the default behavior of many different applications (e.g. meshlab, evince, etc.).
